item.title: Penumbra Summoning Ceremony
item.content:encoded:
Install Dependencies​

  • any other
sudo apt-get install build-essential pkg-config libssl-dev clang git-lfs screen
  • rustup
curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh

Install pcli​

git clone https://github.com/penumbra-zone/penumbra
cd penumbra && git fetch && git checkout v0.63.1
cargo build --release --bin pcli

Generate/Import wallet​

  • Generate Wallet
  • Import Wallet
cargo run --quiet --release --bin pcli init soft-kms generate
cargo run --quiet --release --bin pcli init soft-kms import-phrase

Faucet​

  • View address
cargo run --quiet --release --bin pcli view address 0
  • Request Faucet, Discord

Check balance​

cargo run --quiet --release --bin pcli view sync
cargo run --quiet --release --bin pcli view balance

Contribute​

screen -S penumbra
cargo run --quiet --release --bin pcli -- ceremony contribute --phase 1 --bid 60penumbra --coordinator-address penumbra1qvqr8cvqyf4pwrl6svw9kj8eypf3fuunrcs83m30zxh57y2ytk94gygmtq5k82cjdq9y3mlaa3fwctwpdjr6fxnwuzrsy4ezm0u2tqpzw0sed82shzcr42sju55en26mavjnw4
info
  • The minimum bid for this ceremony is 60penumbra.
  • To change your bid, you can simply run the command again with a different bid amount. Note that each time you bid with the command above, this adds additional funds to all of the previous bids you've already submitted.

Output:

                               ⛔️WARNING️️⛔️:

                        you are about to lose money!

🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥
This message ... is part of a system of messages...
... we considered ourselves to be a fault-tolerant distributed system...
This message is a warning about danger.
The danger is in a particular location... the center of danger is the pcli binary...
The danger is to your funds, and it can destroy them.
The danger is unleashed only if you execute this software.
🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥

                           USE AT YOUR OWN RISK
Scanning blocks from last sync height 0 to latest height 235664
[2m] █████████░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░   46786/235664  383/s ETA: 8m

                           USE AT YOUR OWN RISK
Scanning blocks from last sync height 235949 to latest height 235949
[0s] ██████████████████████████████████████████████████       0/0       0/s ETA: 0s
¸,ø¤º°` initiating summoning participation `°º¤ø,¸
submitting bid 2penumbra for contribution slot from address penumbra1yt3q8shj4ld5ux5t89rha7w0aw2lhd53ypt52l7axvmty50z9g5uq3avhhlqazk4drvdn9rh3hxe4fcq45svn8muphl9kxfpx99pzjmnwjkz8p6dyj262lzlld39cymkwpy39t

Copy transaction confirmed and detected: then tweet​

Example

item.title: Deploy Contract on Aleo without Node
item.content:encoded:
Install Leo Wallet​

  • Download DISINI dan install
  • Buat Wallet
  • Request faucet dengan cara kirim SMS ke nomer +18678885688
  • Kirim pesan menggunakan format
Send 50 credits to aleoxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Mulai Deploy​

  • Setelah mendapat Aleo, pergi ke web Deployer → DISINI
  • Copy ini dan paste ke kolom Deploy
program nama_bebas.aleo;

record Token:
    owner as address.private;
    amount as u64.private;


function mint:
    input r0 as address.private;
    input r1 as u64.private;
    cast r0 r1 into r2 as Token.record;
    output r2 as Token.record;


function transfer:
    input r0 as Token.record;
    input r1 as address.private;
    input r2 as u64.private;
    sub r0.amount r2 into r3;
    cast r0.owner r3 into r4 as Token.record;
    cast r1 r2 into r5 as Token.record;
    output r4 as Token.record;
    output r5 as Token.record;
  • Ganti nama_bebas.aleo dengan nama apapun sesuka hati
  • Pastikan gunakan nama yang belum terpakai, buka Explorer lalu pada kolom Search cari nama yang akan digunakan, jika 404 berarti bisa dipakai.
  • Pastekan privkey leo wallet yang tadi dipake req faucet
  • Isi fee dengan 5
  • Matikan Private Fee
  • Deploy, done

Execute app​

  • Masukan nama app yang sudah di deploy tadi
  • Klik tombol search, maka code nya akan ter-load
  • Masukan Privkey mu ke kolom *Private Key
  • Aktifkan Execute Onchain
  • Isi fee 3
  • Lalu ke bagian mint
  • r0 isi addressmu
  • r1 isi 1000u64
  • Runnnnn
